Text:
Mathematics according to Microsoft. Microsoft Mathematics is an evolution of the Windows Calculator designed for advanced operations, automating complex processes like equations.
The first thing that catches the attention of Microsoft Virtual Mathematics is a calculator where you add to the board the symbols and operations of trigonometry, statistics and algebra, very useful if you have touch screen.
Mathematics Microsoft will save you time by automatically solving equations and its database of formulas and equations with more than 100 models.
In the main window, Microsoft Mathematics shows a history of previous operations, with the possibility to redo them every time. The second tab, Graphing, lets you create graphics from scratch with only the basic parameters. In short, Microsoft Mathematics is much more than a scientific calculator is an essential application for all types of operations. Only you can save a reproach that only a proprietary format file.
-Minimum requirements:
-Processor: 500 MHz
-Memory: 256 MB.
-Video: 64 MB.
"Free space: 65 MB.
-Screen resolution: 800 x 600.
-NET Framework 3.5 SP1.
-S.O. WinXP/Vista/7
-Language: English
Thanks for the translation into English. Greetings
